journal_metadata.full_title: Journal of Exposure Science & Environmental Epidemiology

titles.title: Consequences of kriging and land use regression for PM2.5 predictions in epidemiologic analyses: insights into spatial variability using high-resolution satellite data

custom_metadata.assertion: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
